Manage work packages

Manage work packages in OpenProject.

Overview

Popular Topics Description
Settings Configure general work package settings and defaults, such as display options and more.
Types Create and manage work package types.
Status Create and manage work package status.
Workflows Create and manage workflows for work packages in OpenProject.
Custom actions Create custom actions for work packages (Premium feature)
Attribute help texts Create and manage attribute help texts in OpenProject (Premium feature)
